description: Main entry point for the Flutter mobile application, initializes environment variables, and sets up theming and routing based on device mode (TV or not).

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget that applies theme and routing configuration based on environment variables and device mode.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point that initializes environment, then launches the MyApp widget.

methods.name: _loadEnv
methods.description: Asynchronously loads environment variables from a .env file, with error handling.
